formattedAddress: 4 South St #202, New York, NY 10004, USA
adrFormatAddress: 4 South St #202, New York, NY 10004, USA

editorialSummary.text: Fast-food burger chain serving sides such as chili & baked potatoes.

originalText.text:
It's been a while I tried Wendy's , got my usual the fish burger with medium fries. The food was good.

After I open my bag I saw no napkins so I asked for some. The guy put some on the bag & I run to take the ferry. When I was ready to eat & taking out napkins I find out he only fave me one napkin! Who does that ! Even after I had asked ! After all day working & trying to eat but I had to wait to go home to eat that burger! Because I had no napkins with me..! I could have tried to eat the burger without being messy but I was too irritated to even try lol..!

Besides one issue my service was good. Place could be much cleaner & organized tho..!

originalText.text: Just wanted a frosty for the ferry ride. Note to whoever 'creates' the flavors: next time just keep the strawberry frosty  instead of adding peppermint essence/flavoring to the (existing) strawberry frosty.  It's gross! It taste like some put cough syrup in my strawberry frosty.

text.text: Just wanted a frosty for the ferry ride. Note to whoever 'creates' the flavors: next time just keep the strawberry frosty  instead of adding peppermint essence/flavoring to the (existing) strawberry frosty.  It's gross! It taste like some put cough syrup in my strawberry frosty.

originalText.text: I ordered nuggets and a small chili from this location and let me tell you, I had to throw it away. The nuggets have white web on them and the chili is literally soup! Ruined my entire lunch. Close this location down.

text.text: I ordered nuggets and a small chili from this location and let me tell you, I had to throw it away. The nuggets have white web on them and the chili is literally soup! Ruined my entire lunch. Close this location down.

originalText.text:
Just went 15 minutes ago before catching the 5PM Boat and the woman handing out the food was so rude and unprofessional, there was a woman with a child before me in line who wanted extra sauce and she refused to give her any saying “you got so much sauce why do you need more?” Then I asked for extra as well because the man who took my order said he couldn’t manually input it into the machine (it was broken or something) and he told me he’d give me some when I got my order. She also refused and told me I got all the sauce I need. The thing is I saw her give extra sauce to a man before me not even 10 minutes before this happened, so I know she could have done it. Horrible customer service and I hope she’ll be fired, because me and the woman with the child spoke and we both don’t plan on going back.

EDIT: I also ordered the 10 piece nuggets and only got 7 nuggets. Horrible service

originalText.text: I frequent here often because it’s budget friendly. I have seen people miss the ferry because the service depending on staff is very slow. The manager does his best but he is not in sync with the other employees. Not all employees are courteous and have satisfactory service. For some reason when you order meals that require or customary condiments like ketchup they make a big deal like you are not suppose to ask. Then if you ask for more than what they gave they act like the ketchup fee is being extracted from there pay check. The one star I have chosen for this establishment was well earned and deserve. I hope Wendy’s HR improves the quality of the service or put a sign up that says may encounter som disgruntled employees who are stingy with ketchup like there life depends on it smh.
